Detailed Description

This is the Delegate used in the MainWindow model.

This CubePreviewDelegate is derived from QStyledItemDelegate, as it has to reimplement the paint function to be able to draw a pixmap in it. For more information about the use of Delegates please see: http://doc.trolltech.com/4.5/qstyleditemdelegate.html#details or the delegate example http://doc.trolltech.com/4.5/itemviews-stardelegate.html
